title: Yangtze River Yichang Luxury with Three Restaurants
description: Yichang is home to the atmospheric Three Gorges, an awe-inspiring landscape along the fabled Yangtze River, yours to marvel at from your base at Crowne Plaza Yichang, an IHG Hotel. Spend your days splashing in the indoor swimming pool, enjoying a steam in the sauna or drinking and dining in the three restaurants. Whether you're craving fine-dining Japanese cuisine, Cantonese, Sichuan and Hubei specialties or an international buffet, you'll find something to satisfy.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Yichang, an IHG Hotel
